venue.name: Jerry Remy's Sports Bar and Grill

item.description:
After a sure to be exhausting day at his all day long In-Store Holiday Shopping Party at his SuphaFans Streetware Store, Suphafans leader, Kevin is having an After-Party from 9 pm - 1 am at Jerry Remy's Sports Bar And Grill. Why Remy's? Because both Suphafans and Remy's both opened last spring and were the new kids on the block.

Located just around the corner from Fenway (The former WBCN Building) and 3 blocks from his store, this will be a great spot to relax, party and socialize with Boston's best Sports fans.

To obtain more information about the event and an invitation please go to the Suphafans.com site and sign up for Kevin's newsletter.

Check out details of Jerry's New Restaurant HERE

...steak.
item.name: SuphaFans After Party at Jerry Remy's Bar and Grill
